column1: Little Goat Diner////Atmosphere - You see the words Diner on its windows
column2: but the Little Goat feels like a nice upscale restaurant.  But what you'll find is they've woven the diner theme all throughout the restaurant.  Look around and you'll see classic round barstools
column5: and plenty of coffee cups.  It's a great concept that fits the breakfast all day theme perfectly.  1 Star.
